org.jhove2.module.display
Class XSLDisplayer

java.lang.Object
  org.jhove2.core.reportable.AbstractReportable
      org.jhove2.module.AbstractModule
          org.jhove2.module.display.AbstractDisplayer
              org.jhove2.module.display.XMLDisplayer
                  org.jhove2.module.display.XSLDisplayer
All Implemented Interfaces:
Reportable, Displayer, Module
@Persistent
public class XSLDisplayer
extends XMLDisplayer

An extension of the XMLDisplayer that directly pipelines the XML output to an XSLT stylesheet.

This displayer shall be configured (in JHOVE2 Spring configuration) with scope prototype as a new TrAX Transformer object shall be allocated for each new Reportable to display.

Author:
lbihanic

newTransformer

protected ContentHandler newTransformer(OutputStream out)
Create a new TrAX Transformer object to apply the specified XSLT stylesheet to the XML output of this displayer.

Parameters:
out - the stream where to output the result of the transformation.
Returns:
the SAX ContentHandler object of the XSLT processor to which direct the SAX events of the XML output.

setStylesheet

public void setStylesheet(File f)
                   throws TransformerException
[Dependency injection] Sets the XSLT stylesheet to apply when outputting XML.

Parameters:
f - the XSLT stylesheet file or null to use the identity transformation.
Throws:
TransformerException - if any error occurred while parsing the stylesheet.
